commit.message:
cmath (fpclassify): Use __builtin_fpclassify.

2008-05-23  Paolo Carlini  <paolo.carlini@oracle.com>

	* include/c_std/cmath (fpclassify): Use __builtin_fpclassify.
	* include/c_global/cmath (fpclassify): Likewise.

From-SVN: r135795

+	* include/c_global/cmath (fpclassify): Likewise.
